lead_paragraph: An 8-year-old Mr. Wainwright, a scion of one of the wealthiest families in the United States, made headlines after he sneaked aboard a ship from Bermuda to New York.

headline.print_headline: Carroll L. Wainwright Jr., Estate Lawyer, 90, Dies;  Stowed Away to Fame
headline.main: Carroll Wainwright Jr., ‘Silk-Stockinged Stowaway,’ Dies at 90

snippet: An 8-year-old Mr. Wainwright, a scion of one of the wealthiest families in the United States, made headlines after he sneaked aboard a ship from Bermuda to New York....
abstract: Carroll L Wainwright Jr, World War II Marine Corps pilot and Harvard Law School graduate who served on New York State Commission on Judicial Conduct, and whose privileged childhood garnered worldwide attention when he was discovered, at age 8, as stowaway on SS Queen of Bermuda, dies at age 90.
